name: Audit & Monitor SEO Performance with GPT-4 Advisor, PageSpeed Insights & Slack Alerts
description:
Libérez le plein potentiel de la performance de recherche de votre site web et de l'expérience utilisateur avec ce **modèle d'automatisation n8n tout-en-un**. Conçu pour les professionnels du SEO et les webmasters, cette suite fournit un **audit SEO minutieux sur la page et technique**, des insights approfondis sur les **Core Web Vitals (LCP & INP)**, et un **chatbot intelligent alimenté par l'IA** pour des insights et un dépannage instantanés.

**Caractéristiques clés :**
- **Audit SEO complet sur la page** : Vérifie automatiquement les **titres manquants ou mal formés, les méta descriptions, les H1 (y compris plusieurs H1), le texte alternatif manquant sur les images, et les problèmes de balises canoniques.**
- **Scan technique SEO détaillé** : Vérifie la **mise en œuvre de HTTPS, l'accessibilité et le contenu de robots.txt**, et la présence de **sitemap.xml**.
- **Surveillance des Core Web Vitals** : Exploite **Google PageSpeed Insights** pour suivre en continu et alerter sur des métriques de performance critiques comme le **Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)** et l'**Interaction to Next Paint (INP)**.
- **Analyse et recommandations alimentées par l'IA** : Intègre des modèles d'IA avancés (ChatGPT, Claude ou Gemini) pour **analyser les résultats de l'audit**, fournir des **recommandations exploitables** pour des améliorations, et même suggérer un meilleur texte alternatif pour les images en fonction du contexte du contenu.
- **Chatbot SEO intelligent** : Un chatbot dynamique déclenché par des webhooks comprend les requêtes en langage naturel, extrait des entités (URLs, mots-clés, sujets SEO), et fournit des **réponses instantanées générées par l'IA** sur les meilleures pratiques SEO, des explications sur les Core Web Vitals, ou même des données spécifiques au site (via l'intégration de Google Search Console).
- **Rapports et alertes automatisés** : Enregistre toutes les données d'audit dans **Google Sheets** pour un suivi historique et envoie des **alertes Slack en temps réel** pour des problèmes SEO critiques ou des dégradations de performance.

Rationalisez votre flux de travail SEO, assurez la santé optimale de votre site web, et réagissez rapidement aux défis de performance. Ce modèle est votre outil ultime pour rester en avance dans le paysage numérique compétitif.

workflow.name: Advanced SEO, Core Web Vitals & Chatbot Automation Suite

nodes.name: Scheduled SEO & Core Web Vitals Audit
nodes.description: Triggers comprehensive SEO and Core Web Vitals check every 4 hours

nodes.name: Chatbot Webhook Listener
nodes.description: Receives user queries from external chatbot platforms

nodes.name: Monitored Websites List
nodes.description: List of websites to monitor for SEO and performance

nodes.name: HTTP Crawler
nodes.description: Fetches raw HTML content for parsing

nodes.name: Cheerio HTML Parser (On-Page SEO)
nodes.description: Extracts critical on-page SEO elements from HTML

nodes.name: On-Page SEO Validator
nodes.description: Checks for common on-page SEO issues

nodes.name: Fetch Robots.txt
nodes.description: Fetches the robots.txt file for analysis

nodes.name: Check Sitemap.xml Presence
nodes.description: Checks if sitemap.xml exists (will fail if 404)

nodes.name: Technical SEO Validator
nodes.description: Validates HTTPS, robots.txt presence/content, and sitemap.xml

nodes.name: AI SEO Audit & Recommendations
nodes.description: Uses AI to deeply analyze combined SEO data and provide smart recommendations

nodes.name: Google PageSpeed Insights API
nodes.description: Fetches Core Web Vitals (LCP, INP, CLS) and other performance/SEO metrics

nodes.name: Save Comprehensive SEO Report to Google Sheet

parameters.data: ={{ JSON.stringify({ URL: $json.url, Date: new Date().toISOString().split('T')[0], TitleOK: !$json.onPageIssues.missing_title && !$json.onPageIssues.title_too_short && !$json.onPageIssues.title_too_long, DescOK: !$json.onPageIssues.missing_meta_description && !$json.onPageIssues.meta_description_too_short && !$json.onPageIssues.meta_description_too_long, HasH1: !$json.onPageIssues.missing_h1, MultipleH1: $json.onPageIssues.multiple_h1, MissingAltTextCount: $json.onPageIssues.missing_alt_text_count, CanonicalPresent: !$json.onPageIssues.missing_canonical, NoindexPresent: $json.onPageIssues.noindex_present, SchemaPresent: $json.onPageIssues.schema_present, IsHTTPS: $json.technicalIssues.is_https, SitemapPresent: $json.technicalIssues.sitemap_xml_present, LCP: $node["Google PageSpeed Insights API"].json["lighthouseResult"].audits["largest-contentful-paint"].numericValue, INP: $node["Google PageSpeed Insights API"].json["lighthouseResult"].audits["interaction-to-next-paint"].numericValue, AIRecommendations: $node["AI SEO Audit & Recommendations"].json["choices"][0].message.content }) }}

nodes.description: Logs detailed on-page, technical, and Core Web Vitals data to a Google Sheet

nodes.name: Overall SEO Health Check (Alert Trigger)
nodes.description: Triggers alert if any critical SEO or CWV issue is found

nodes.name: Send Comprehensive SEO Audit Alert (Slack)
nodes.description: Sends detailed audit findings and AI recommendations to Slack

nodes.name: AI Chatbot NLP & Response

parameters.prompt:
The user asked: '{{ $json.body.query }}'. Analyze their query about SEO or website performance (LCP/INP) and provide a relevant, concise, and actionable response. Focus on identifying specific entities like 'website URL', 'keyword', 'SEO topic', or 'technical issue'. Based on the query, provide explanations, best practices, or troubleshooting steps.

Example intents:
- 'Check SEO for [URL]'
- 'Explain LCP/INP'
- 'How to fix missing titles?'
- 'What's wrong with my robots.txt?'

If the query requires data retrieval, state that you are fetching the data and then provide a summary. If the query is general, provide a general SEO/performance tip. Be helpful and professional.

nodes.description: Processes chatbot query, understands intent, and generates intelligent response

nodes.name: Extract Chatbot Entities & Intent
nodes.description: Extracts key information and intent from chatbot queries

nodes.name: Google Search Console API - Query Data (Chatbot)
nodes.description: Fetches keyword performance data for chatbot queries

nodes.name: Respond to Chatbot Webhook
nodes.description: Sends the AI-generated response back to the chatbot platform

nodes.name: Re-Crawl for Chatbot Audit
nodes.description: Performs an on-demand crawl if requested by chatbot

nodes.name: Execute SEO Audit Workflow (Chatbot Trigger)
nodes.description: Triggers the main SEO audit workflow from chatbot request

nodes.name: If Chatbot Requests Full Audit
nodes.description: Checks if the chatbot query explicitly asks for a full SEO audit

data.details: The Cron node uses Cron under the hood - a time-based job scheduler in Unix-like computer operating systems. Use this node when you want to trigger workflows periodically, especially in more complex scenarios like "every Tuesday at 9 am" or "Weekdays".

data.details: The Function node allows you to execute JavaScript in your workflow. Unlike the Function Item node, this node does not operate on incoming node data per-item. Instead, you must iterate over multiple items of incoming data yourself. This can be useful if you're performing data transformation where you want to manipulate the number of items being outputted by the node (i.e. 1 item is inputted in with nested object, 10 items are outputted without any nested objects)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.
